Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

HMDIDRIVER

The basic type HMDIDRIVER is a handle to an digital audio device.

Discussion

HMDIDRIVER handles are returned from the AIL_open_XMIDI_driver function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AILBEATCB, AILEVENTCB, AILTIMBRECB, AIL_DLS_open, AIL_MDI_driver_type, AIL_MIDI_handle_reacquire, AIL_MIDI_handle_release, AIL_XMIDI_master_volume, AIL_active_sequence_count, AIL_allocate_sequence_handle, AIL_close_XMIDI_driver, AIL_create_wave_synthesizer, AIL_install_MDI_INI, AIL_install_MDI_driver_file, AIL_install_MDI_driver_image, AIL_install_timbre, AIL_lock_channel, AIL_midiOutOpen, AIL_open_XMIDI_driver, AIL_protect_timbre, AIL_quick_handles, AIL_register_beat_callback, AIL_register_event_callback, AIL_register_timbre_callback, AIL_release_channel, AIL_send_channel_voice_message, AIL_send_sysex_message, AIL_set_XMIDI_master_volume, AIL_timbre_status, AIL_unprotect_timbre
